item.title: Wish You Happy Breakup
item.description: Naresh is an aspiring filmmaker who wants to make it big in Tollywood. He tries hard but ends up failing many times. Seeing his horrible situation, Naresh’s girlfriend dumps him and settles with someone else. Rest of the story is as to how Naresh deals with his breakup and makes it big in the industry.
item.tags: Movie,Full Movie,Telugu Movie,entertainment,Drama,Wish You Happy Breakup

item.title: Kumari Mallika
item.description: Mallika is a divorcee and an independent woman who falls in love with Surya a college student who shows his equal interest towards her. Surya enjoys the life with the money given by Mallika, later to discover that he is cheating on her.
item.tags: Kumari Mallika, Movie, Full Movie, Romance, Whacked Out Media, Telugu Movie, Telugu

item.title: Mirzya
item.description: A timeless folktale about star-crossed lovers is played out in two parallel worlds, one real, and one fantastical. As the lovers grapple with forces that seek to keep them apart in both avatars, they discover that even a moment of true love is worth an entire lifetime.
item.producer: Rohit Khattar, Rakeysh Omprakash Mehra, P.S. Bharathi, Rajiv Tandon
item.tags: Mirzya, Harshvardhan Kapoor,Saiyami Kher,Bollywood,Hindi,Film

item.title: Love Exchange
item.description: Love Exchange is a lovey-dovey flick based on the love story of a culturally opposite couple – Siddharth Sathe and Shanoo Kapoor. They fall in love with each other while working in the similar workspace. Eventually as they get wiser towards each other, they still remain half a mind about marriage.
item.tags: Love,Exchange,Full Movies,Movie,Film,Entertainment,Drama,Blockbuster

item.title: Ee Cinema Superhit Guarantee
item.description: Mahadev is a carefree guy who dreams of becoming a filmmaker. He is smitten by three women in life and all the three affairs prove to be a disaster. The interesting point is that all the three girls are named Sirisha.What is it in Mahadev that causes failures in his love relationships?
item.tags: Ee Cinema Superhit Guarantee, Movie, Full Movie, Romance, Whacked Out Media, Telugu Movie, Telugu

item.title: Kerintha
item.description: Jai, Sid, Bhavana and Nookaraju are friends in college, who come from different family backgrounds. When Jai falls in love with Manaswini, the rest of the group helps his love succeed.

item.title: Kumari 21F
item.description: Siddhu - a Chef, falls in love with Kumari, a struggling model from Mumbai. However, he begins to doubt her fidelity as his friends tell him that she has many other boyfriends.

item.title: Yaara Silly Silly
item.description: A sex worker and her client meet each other again after having spent a night together before. Through a journey, they discover each other and a relationship that change their lives forever.
item.producer: Reena Bhushan Suri, Neena Subhash Sehgal

item.title: Ek Khiladi
item.description: Venky, a happy-go-lucky man loves and respects his friends. He helps his best friend elope with the daughter of a powerful don, Babji. When Babji learns about it, he sends his men to find Venky.
item.tags: Movie, Full Movie, Ek Khiladi, Goldmines Telefilms

item.title: Purno Doirgho Prem Kahini
item.description: The film is about Joy who is engaged to his cousin Mithu. But he promises his grandfather that he will not tie the knot before he finds his missing aunt and uncle. In search of his missing relatives, he goes to Malaysia, where he meets Jara who is a UN employee. They become familiar with each other and Jara helps Joy find his aunt. Joy, appreciative of her companionship and help, falls for Jara. To avoid him, Jara gets involved with another man Shakib. In this situation, the climax of the film comes down between responsibility towards family, relatives and love affairs.

item.title: Shrungaram
item.description: Bhartrihari was the king of Malwa whose capital city was Ujjain. The famous emperor Vikramaditya was the younger stepbrother of king Bhartrihari. After removing Vikramaditya on the command of Queen Pingala (his wife) after which he meets a Monk who gives him a fruit that would increase THE YOUTH PERIOD in his life span. Bhartrihari does not eat the fruit himself but give it to his beloved youngest Queen Pingla, because he was madly obsessed with her. The Queen didnt ate it but gave it to a young, well built, brave horse keeper / slave Adhirath whom she is in love with, whereas from Adhirath it reaches to Nagar Vadhu Lavanya to whom he likes.
item.tags: Romance, Full Movie, Kumar Aadarsh, Kushi Mukherji

item.title: 50 Percent Love
item.description: Ramesh and Rupesh are good friends who study in GITAM college. Rupesh deeply loves Nancy , who is also a student in the same college but he is afraid of expressing his love for her. On coming to know about this, Ramesh teams up with Nancy’s friend Narayana to get the two together and after a while, Nancy begins responding to Rupesh’s love. Just when everything seems nice and rosy, Nancy’s father plans to get her married and this is when he comes to know about the romantic affair between Rupesh and Nancy. He offers Rupesh a crore of money to leave his daughter and Rupesh agrees.
item.tags: Whacked Out Media, Telugu Movies, Full Movies, 50 Percent Love

item.title: Sarocharu
